SELECT t1.cost as "sumcost", t2.budgetnumber as "sumbudgetnumber", CONCAT(ROUND( t1.cost/t2.budgetnumber * 100),"%") as "ratio", t3.income as "sumincome", t3.lastyearpercent as "lastyearpercent" from (SELECT SUM(t.cost) as "cost",m.`month` as "month" FROM tb_finance_expenses_month t LEFT JOIN tb_month m ON m.`month` = t.cost_happend_time WHERE t.record_status = 1 AND m. MONTH BETWEEN #{StartTime} AND #{endTime}) t1 INNER JOIN
(SELECT SUM(t.budget_number) as "budgetnumber",m.`month` as "month" FROM tb_finance_total_budget t RIGHT JOIN tb_month m ON m.`month` = t.budget_month AND t.record_status = 1 WHERE m. MONTH BETWEEN #{StartTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY m.`month`) t2 INNER JOIN
(SELECT sum(t.income) as "income", SUM(t.last_year_income) as "lastyearincome", m.month as "month", IFNULL(CONCAT(ROUND(IF (SUM(t.last_year_income) = NULL,0,(SUM(t.income) - SUM(t.last_year_income)) / SUM(t.last_year_income))* 100),"%"),"0%") AS "lastyearpercent" FROM tb_finance_income_month t RIGHT JOIN tb_month m ON m.`month` = t.income_month AND t.record_status = 1 WHERE m. MONTH BETWEEN #{StartTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY m.`month`) t3 ON t1.month=t2.month and t2.month = t3.month
